price: Abaaramtoota (ta’anii malee Madiinaa keessatti sitti hin ollooman). Iddoma argamanitti qabamanii ajjeefamiinsa (hamaa) ajjeefaman.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
